issue.subject: Keywords duplication in xml
issue.description:
Saving a metadata, using keywords information, duplicates the chosen keywords in xml.

This duplication prevents INSPIRE xml validation.

journals.notes:
After a test, 

A complement : I had add a relation class in my model, which was duplicating  the keyword field selected.

Parent Class   Son Class
MD_Metadata -> MD_Keywords and I added on this relation, a relation class : MD_Keyword... It generated the duplication of the field.

I solve my problem, and just explain it for feedback.
Thanks Clément for this tips & trick.
